title: i miss the general chat room ..
body:
It's a discussion that you could join without invitation at any time and talk with people you didn't know in the game, and since you weren't in the game, there was very little flame 

https://www.zupimages.net/up/19/36/e183.png
Pls Riot bring back this function this is a  good way to find people to play with or even just talk to! and not Clubs is not the same :(
